alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 05 at 8:12AM AKDT until July 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM AKDT THURSDAY FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 10 PM AKDT Thursday. * AFFECTED AREA...Near the Richardson Highway from Black Rapids north. * TIMING...From noon today to 10 PM AKDT Thursday. * WINDS...South 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower to mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
